title: TrueCrypt 6.1, VLC Media Player 0.9.6 and other useful FREEWARE
description:
This virus-scanned and clean package consists of:

TrueCrypt 6.1
**************
a powerful, open-source encryption tool


VLC Media Player 0.9.6
**********************
a highly portable multimedia player for various audio and video formats (MPEG-1, MPEG-2, MPEG-4, DivX, mp3, ogg, ...) as well as DVDs, VCDs, and various streaming protocols. It can also be used as a server to stream in unicast or multicast in IPv4 or IPv6 on a high-bandwidth network. It doesn't need any external codec or program to work.


Media Player Classic 6.4.9.1
****************************
looks just like Windows Media Player 6.4, but has many additional features. It has a built in DVD player with real-time zoom, support for AVI subtitles, QuickTime and RealVideo support; built-in MPEG2/SVCD/DVD codec


Peer Guardian 2
***************
PeerGuardian 2 is an IP address blocker that can prevent access to thousands of sites. It uses multiple, categorized lists and you can choose which type of site(s) you want to block, including spyware/malware related, advertising related, P2P file sharing related and more. The lists are maintained and updated by a community and you can automatically have the program download the latests lists, and also create your own based on your personal blocking preference. PeerGuardian 2 keeps track of all blocked sites, and you can easily overwrite blocking rules or add new site directly from the log viewer


Arachnophilia 5.4
*****************
a Web page development workshop and general programming tool


Audiograbber 1.83
*****************
one of the best tools to rip your audio CD's; menues in: English, Spanish, Italian, French and German


Screamer Radio v0.4.3
*********************
listen to radiostations all over the world


TrayColor
*********
pick the right colour for your website


...plus a minigame: if you catch all the bottles with the beer box, the girls will strip for you (it helps if you had a few beers first :-))

n-joy, Cheers!
